pr_title: Introduce docker pruning when running the cron job

timeline.message: Introduce docker pruning when running the cron job
Introduce docker pruning when running the cron job
Introduce docker pruning when running the cron job

timeline.bodyText: Same here, maybe move it to .github?
timeline.author: gsmet
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,13 @@
+#!/usr/bin/env bash
+
+set -e
+
+# pruning is only run when inside CI to avoid accidentally removing stuff
+# GITHUB_ACTIONS is always set to true inside Github Actions
+# https://help.github.com/en/actions/configuring-and-managing-workflows/using-environment-variables
+if [ "${GITHUB_ACTIONS}" == true ] ; then
+  docker container prune -f
+  docker image prune -f
+  docker network prune -f
+  docker volume prune -f
+fi

replies.bodyText: Yes, it would be better to not show that to innocent eyes ;-)
replies.author: cescoffier
